description.description: Human-readable description for the IKE policy.

tenant_id.description:
Owner of the VPN service. Only administrative users can specify a
tenant ID other than their own.

auth_algorithm.description:
The authentication hash algorithm. A valid value is ``sha1`` ,
which is the default.

name.description: Human-readable name for the IKE policy. Does not have to be unique.

encryption_algorithm.description:
The encryption algorithm. A valid value is ``3des`` , ``aes-128`` ,
``aes-192`` , ``aes-256`` , and so on. Default is ``aes-128`` .

pfs.description:
Perfect forward secrecy (PFS). A valid value is ``Group2`` ,
``Group5`` , ``Group14`` , and so on. Default is ``Group5`` .

value.description: Lifetime value, as a positive integer. Default is 3600 seconds.

phase1_negotiation_mode.description: The IKE mode. A valid value is ``main`` , which is the default.

units.description: Units for lifetime of the security association. Default is seconds.

lifetime.description:
The lifetime of the security association. The lifetime consists of
a unit and integer value. You can omit either the unit or value
portion of the lifetime.

id.description: The unique ID for the IKE policy.

ike_version.description:
The IKE version. A valid value is ``v1`` or ``v2`` . Default is
``v1`` .
